name: Balloon Quest
description:
To the Player

Balloon Quest is a playable game created for the 2016 National 
STEM Video Game Challenge. Players of the game are tasked with 
navigating the game world and finding seven balloons.

Thank you for playing.

- Balaji

Source Code

https://github.com/bveeramani/stem-2016

Controls

Jump - A Move - LEFT and RIGHT Interact - DOWN Dash - S Exit - F1 Reset - F2

Download Instructions

To download the submission, go to https://bveeramani.itch.io/stem-2016. Click the button titled "Download" by the text "Release 1.0.0." A file titled "Balloon Quest.zip" will be downloaded to a file path of your specification. Once downloaded, extract the files and open the folder titled "Balloon Quest." Run the executable object "Balloon Quest.exe" to play. The game will begin after loading momentarily.
